description: Install Git from the official Git repository.
name: Git Installation

instller_dir.description: Path to a directory to download the installer to.

logfile.description: Log all output (stdout + stderr) to this file in addition to console.

no_clean.description: Skip removing installer artifacts after installation.

prefix.description: Path to the directory where Git will be installed.

source.description:
URL to download the Git source code from.
The full URL is built by appending the resolved version to this URL.

sysconfdir.description: Path to the system configuration directory for Git.

version.description:
Version of Git to install.
This must be a regex matching a version number (`^` and `$` are automatically added to this). The latest version matching the regex will be selected. If not specified, the latest version will be installed.
